resources.string: Use your security key with %1$s
Using your security key with %1$s helps protect your private data.
Get started
%1$s acts as a trusted browser to use your security key with %2$s.
Yes, %1$s is my trusted browser and should be allowed to use security keys with third-party websites.
Choose how to use your security key
Security keys work with Bluetooth, NFC, and USB. Choose how you want to use your key.
Verify your identity
"%1$s needs to verify it's you."
Connect your USB security key
Connect your security key to the USB port or connect it with an USB cable. If your key has a button or a gold disc, tap it now.
Connect your NFC security key
Hold your key flat against the back of your device until it stops vibrating
Use security key with Bluetooth
Use security key with NFC
Use security key with USB
Use this device with screen lock
Please connect your USB security key.
Please tap the golden ring or disc on %1$s.
Please enter the PIN for your authenticator
4 to 63 characters
OK
Cancel
Wrong PIN entered!
Change how to use your security key
Select an account
to continue using %1$s
Passkey
Scan QR code with another device
Use your phone or tablet to scan this QR code and complete the sign-in
Connecting to device…
Waiting for connection…
Bluetooth permission is required to use cross-device authentication.
Bluetooth permission required

Bluetooth permission has been permanently denied. To enable cross-device authentication:

1. Tap “Go to settings”
2. Find Permissions / App permissions
3. Enable Location (or “Nearby devices” on Android 12+)
4. Return to the app and try again
Go to settings
Unable to open Settings. Please grant the Location permission (or "Nearby devices" on Android 12+) in system settings manually.
Cross-device authentication is unavailable without permission.
Scan this QR code with another device to create a passkey
Scan this QR code with your phone or tablet to sign in
Only connect to devices you trust
Another device will create a passkey on this device
Another device will use a passkey on this device to sign in
Connecting to device…
Establishing secure connection with the other device
Connect
Cancel
Connection failed
Could not connect to the other device. Please try again.
